sentences.sContent: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.sCn: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.sContent: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.sCn: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

sentences.sContent: ...when he met his first girlfriend at his best friend's 16th birthday party...
...David told me you had a special birthday coming up...
...my sister’s birthday is December 9th and her golden birthday would have been the year she turns 9 years old...
...A golden or lucky birthday is when one turns the age of their birth date...
...My golden birthday would’ve been four years ago...
...I'm taking my girlfriend to the fancy new restaurant for her birthday tonight...
...I just had my birthday a week before...
...we generally don’t give gifts on other occasions except on someone’s birthday and Christmas...
...There were more than a hundred people at Kate's birthday party...

phrases.pCn: 生日快乐；祝你生日快乐
n. 生日女郎（电影名，等于惊婚计）
乔治华盛顿诞辰纪念日

trans.tranOther: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born
